summary: Two westward-bound families join forces to battle gunslingers.
cast: Will Rogers Jr.|Maureen O'Sullivan|Rod McKuen|Casey Tibbs|Judi Meredith|Troy Donahue|George Winslow|Gigi Perreau|Gary Gray|Jeanette Nolan|Paul Birch|John Beradino|Phil Harvey|Lawrence Dobkin|Stephen Ellsworth|Ingrid Goude|Christopher Dark|Guy Wilkerson|Johnny Carpenter|Beatrice Gray|Donald Kerr
director: Director: Charles F. Haas (as Charles Haas)
title: Legado salvaje
